section.p: A flying throne swoops down out of the sky. On it sits a mad-looking fellow with a ludicrously long white beard.

'It's an unwanted visit from Holyamu the Unbidden!' he cries insanely, hurtling past over your head. He drops a salvo of rotten eggs as he goes, fouling your clothes with stinking egg-yolk. You shake your fist at him, cursing, but he is soon out of sight. Disgruntled, you journey on. .
